title: Bitcoin to Score 'Golden Cross' After 30% Price Surge in Two Weeks

title: SBF Trial Live Updates: Sam Bankman-Fried to Take the Stand
description: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried faces seven criminal charges related to the dramatic collapse of his crypto empire. Here's the latest on his trial.

title: SBF testimony will detail FTX operations and the role of lawyers
description:
Sam Bankman-Fried’s (SBF) legal team said his testimony would center on his understanding of industry practices and the transfer of FTX assets to Bahamian authorities following the company’s collapse last year. SBF’s testimony will also shed light on his understanding of whether legal professionals played a role in various aspects of FTX’s operations and his […]

The post SBF testimony will detail FTX operations and the role of lawyers appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Nintendo Introduces New Content Creation Guidelines
description: In a bid to maintain control over its intellectual property and foster a respectful relationship with content creators, Nintendo has recently unveiled an updated set of guidelines for individuals who create and share content based on its games. title: British Agencies Sound Alarm on the AI Threat, Putting Democracy at Risk
description: In a pivotal move preceding a global safety summit on technology hosted in London, the U.K. government has sounded the alarm on the imminent threat posed by generative artificial intelligence systems. title: Can a crypto-friendly leader change Argentina’s economy amid hyperinflation?
description: Argentina's economic turmoil has driven residents toward precious metals and digital currencies. Pro-Bitcoin candidate Javier Milei aims to use digital assets to create a fair financial market.

title: Unciphered’s Invitation to Ripple CTO: Crack Bitcoin Hardware Wallet Securing 7,002 BTC Worth $244,000,000
description: Crypto recovery firm Unciphered offers to unlock a hard drive with $244 million in Bitcoin for former Ripple CTO Stefan Thomas. title: Three Technologies That Are Immune to Censorship
description:
In today’s world, where the internet and tech play big roles in the social, political, and economic spheres, censorship resistance is assuming critical importance. This concept encompasses the ability of individuals or entities to communicate and access information freely, shielded from external interference by entities such as governments, corporations, or third-party intermediaries. title: A New Massive Dump: FTX and Alameda’s Intention Remains a Mystery
description:
Crypto-analytic platform Lookonchain unearthed a massive dumping of millions of dollars in assets from wallets associated with the bankrupt FTX and Alameda Research to Binance. These assets, accounting for a total of $13.5 million, include 974,270 Render (RNDR) and 21,967 Compound (COMP), worth $2 million and $995K, respectively. As per the findings of Lookonchain, FTX […]

title: US-Regulated Spot Bitcoin ETF To Trigger BTC Surge Over $46,840, Says Galaxy Digital – Here’s the Timeline
description:
